```{r}
 kable(ggplot_Graph) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
# formatPercentage(ggplot_Graph,'Répartition des ventes', digits = "3")
format('Répartition des ventes', digits = "2")
#Tabset {.tabset.tabset-fade.tabset-pills}
## Tab 1
   ggplot(ggplot_Graph, aes(x=reorder(ggplot_Graph$Désignation.Famille, ggplot_Graph$Montant.Total), fill=ggplot_Graph$'Désignation.Famille', y=ggplot_Graph$Montant.Total))+geom_histogram(color="#4EDB1B", stat = 'identity')+theme_light() %>%
     +theme(axis.title = element_blank(), axis.text.x = element_text(color = 'steelblue', size = 8, hjust = 1, face = "italic") ) %>%
     +theme(axis.line.y = element_line(colour = "#50BFC9", linetype = "dotted", size = 1))+theme(legend.position = 'bottom', legend.title = element_blank()) %>%
     +theme(axis.line.x = element_line(colour = "lightblue", linetype = "dotdash"))+scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set3")+scale_x_discrete(labels = abbreviate)
### End tabset
```
